message: Bob, I have a fantastic opportunity for you. I'm offering you a product that I know you'll find valuable. It's worth at least $1,200,000 to me, but I'm willing to let it go for $1,000,000. This is a significant discount, and I'm confident it will be a great investment for you. Consider this your chance to acquire a valuable asset at a price you can't refuse. Let me know if you're interested.
